item.title: Export and import Vuex state
item.description: If you are familiarized with Vuex, you must know that Vuex is a state management pattern library for Vue applications. Vuex centralizes the application’s state and how components, and other code parts, change it. You can find a lot of articles talking about Vuex, I even wrote 2 articles 3 year ago talking about it: Vuex el redux de VueJS I and Vuex el redux de VueJS II (Spanish) But today I will write about an edge case related to vuex, as you could read in the title, about how to export and import Vuex state.
